name: Crazybone 1: Wormology
description:
ok this is crazybone and jim. 

In order to collect them you will have to shoot your way through more than one levels of twin stick shooting actionen and adventure and also thrills. When you are not twin stick shooting there is some kind of visual novel deal that goes on. and also you press the space bar to JUMP which lets you jump over some bullets and stuff like that

Stop reading this and hit the download button before somebody thinks you are having a stroke and takes your hands for making punch. WARNING: you have tyo play this game or you will DIE.
